leads.title: Don’t start tech startup
leads.comment:
It appears that the post title is advising against starting a tech startup. While starting a tech startup can be challenging and risky, it can also be rewarding and innovative. It's important to weigh the pros and cons carefully before making such a decision.

leads.title: Will there ever be new tech startups that beat the big players (Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft, Google)?
leads.comment:
It's always an interesting and evolving landscape in the tech industry. While the big players like Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft, and Google have established dominance, the potential for new tech startups to disrupt the market and challenge their positions is always present. Innovation, agility, and a keen understanding of market needs can pave the way for new players to make a significant impact. It will be exciting to see how the tech ecosystem continues to evolve with the emergence of potential game-changing startups.
